definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
stag beetle (generic term for the beetles in the family of lucanidae)

sentences.english: I need one, and your sons-in-law can dig new clay for Susana.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一把鍬，你的女婿可以幫蘇姍娜挖新的黏土。

sentences.english: His spade cleaved the firm sand with a satisfying crunch.
sentences.chinese: 他的鍬鑿開了堅實的砂土，發出令人舒心的嘎扎聲。

sentences.english: One bent to pluck from the haft a long tuft of grass.
sentences.chinese: 一個人彎下腰去摘纏在鍬把上的一縷長草。

sentences.english: The Ace through Ten of Spades are then set aside and the deck is reassembled.
sentences.chinese: 一點通過十倍鍬然後留出，並且甲板被重新召集。

sentences.english: As a result, there was a legal requirement to monitor the species' numbers.
sentences.chinese: 因此，監測鍬蟲物種數量是一項法律要求。

sentences.english: What business has a pick and a shovel here?
sentences.chinese: 這裏要鍬和鎬頭幹什麼？

sentences.english: We all went back to our shovels, no one daring to say a word.
sentences.chinese: 我們都拿起了鍬，誰都不敢只一聲。

sentences.english: I trailed behind, carrying the shovels.
And he laid the shovel and mattock on the floor.
sentences.chinese: 同時他把鍬和鎬放在方磚地上。

definition: a long narrow vessel with two masts
